column4: Pinning allows you to use packages from hoary in warty.  Follow the directions at http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/PinningHowto for details.

If you are beffuddled by the fact that your Gnome menus have changed after a recent upgrade, don't be alarmed. This is only temporary while the Ubuntu proposed changes are taken care of upstream.  For more see http://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel/2004-December/002057.html.
I give up, what is it?
